about_the_game:
Hunt:Primal Reptiles

The most realistic prehistoric hunt-survival game ever! Huge Jurassic habitat inhabited by many prehistoric carnivorous reptiles, such as Spinosaurus, T-Rex, Triceratops, Velociraptor. You can also meet herbivorous Parasoulour! An unusual adventure in a jungle full of dangers!
The game combines elements of a classic hunting simulator and survival. You traverse a vast, open world full of life and realistic fauna. Apart from many dinosaur species, different dangers await you, such as huge mosquitoes and poisonous plants. You will meet a lot of prehistoric reptiles. From small, agile specimen to powerful giants weighing tonnes.

You will have a huge island from the Cretaceous Period at your disposal. Each traveled meter will be a test of survival! You will find a piece of a basic, random equipment. To survive, you have to conquer the world in search of a better weapon, technology, ammo.
The island, where you are located, is inhabited (In early access, in the future we plan to add more dinosaur) by 5 different dinosaur species. From blood-thirsty Tyrannosaurus to small and agile velociraptors. Choose your target carefully, find enough ammo, and stuff.

Main Functions

  • a huge exploration area
  • various dinosaur species of various weight and sex,
  • hunt by day and night,
  • a limited amount of ammo!, Explore and hunt in order to survive!,
  • a huge arsenal to use — from the pistol to the sniper rifle
  • an island full of life,

    Weapons

    There will be over 6 types of weapons available in the game.

    island

    Each part of the island hides different dinosaur species, plants or annoying insects.

    DINOSAURS

    We currently own 5 dinosaur species. Each dinosaur has different markings. There are both male and female dinosaurs. Each specimen also differs in weight, so that every player can compare their trophies with others!

name: Hunt: Primal Reptiles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 10
  • Processor: Inter Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI

short_description: The most realistic prehistoric hunt-survival game ever! Huge Jurassic habitat inhabited by many prehistoric carnivorous reptiles!
